====================================

Government of Canada Invitation to Tender
------------------------------------------

### Request for Standing Offer Solicitation Announcement [WS4517385568]

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites qualified contractors to submit proposals for the provision of welding, non-destructive testing (NDT), and coating inspection services in support of the Canadian Coast Guard (CCG).

### Contract Details

*   **Contract Number:** RFSO F7049-230165
*   **Bid Closing Date:** May 3, 2024, at 2:00 PM Eastern Standard Time (EST)
*   **Contract Value:** Negotiable
*   **Contract Duration:** The contract will run for an unspecified duration
*   **Location:** Toronto and St. Catharines

### Scope of Work

The selected contractor will provide welding, NDT, and coating inspection services for the Canadian Coast Guard (CCG) vessel CCGS Terry Fox during its refit period at Ontario Shipyards, both in drydock and alongside. The scope of work includes:

*   Welding inspection
*   NDT inspection
*   Coating inspection in accordance with NACE standards

### Evaluation Criteria

The solicitations will be evaluated based on the lowest price.

### Contracting Entity and Contact Information

The contracting entity for this solicitation is the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC). Contracting officials can be reached by contacting:

Hatherall, Mark (SPAC/PSPC) at `mark.hatherall@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca`

### Notice and Regulation

The full notice is available on the Ariba Discovery website at https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19282627?extsite=MTkyODI2MjdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

### Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

This solicitation is governed by the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) between Canada and other participating provinces.

### Government of Canada’s approach to trade agreement

This opportunity is open to all participating suppliers with the required certifications, credentials, and licenses that meet the solicitation requirements. Supplier must demonstrate they meet the general requirements and the solicitations requirements found on this solicitation. Supplier must be registered in the Trade Agreements section under All trade agreements.
